1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings**.

1. Under Workspace, select **Attestations**.

1. Click **{{< fa plus >}} Add Attestation**.

1. Enter a **[name]{.smallcaps}** and **[description]{.smallcaps}** for the attestation.

1. Click **Add Attestation**.

1. [Configure the attestation](/guide/attestation/set-up-attestations.qmd#configure-attestations).
